mapper.select: SELECT tst.term_idx, tst.term_logical_nm, tst.term_physical_nm, tsd.domain_nm, tsd.data_type, tsd.data_length, FROM tb_std_term tst JOIN tb_std_domain tsd ON tst.domain_idx = tsd.domain_idx WHERE term_idx > #{(pageNum - 1) * 20} ORDER BY term_idx ASC LIMIT 20;

SELECT tst.term_idx, tst.term_logical_nm, tst.term_logical_desc, tst.term_physical_nm, tst.term_physical_desc, tsd.domain_nm, tsd.data_type, tsd.data_length, tsd.allowed_values, tsd.store_format, tsd.represent_format FROM tb_std_term tst JOIN tb_std_domain tsd ON tst.domain_idx = tsd.domain_idx WHERE term_idx = #{term_idx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_std_term(term_logical_nm, term_logical_desc, term_physical_nm, term_physical_desc, domain_idx) VALUES (#{term_logical_nm}, #{term_logical_desc}, #{term_physical_nm}, #{term_physical_desc}, #{domain_idx})
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_std_term SET term_logical_nm = #{term_logical_nm}, term_logical_desc = #{term_logical_desc}, term_physical_nm = #{term_physical_nm}, term_physical_desc = #{term_physical_desc}, domain_idx = #{domain_idx} WHERE term_idx = #{term_idx}
